content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here is the Julia function that performs the task:

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = []
    in_code_block = false
    current_block = ""

    for (i, line) in enumerate(split(md, "\n"))
        if starts_with(line, "```julia")
            in_code_block = true
            current_block = ""
        elseif in_code_block && ends_with(line, "```julia")
            in_code_block = false
        else
            if in_code_block
                current_block *= strip(line) * "\n"
            end
        end
    end

    code_blocks = split(current_block, "\n\n")

    if length(code_blocks) > 0
        return join(code_blocks, "\n")
    else
        return ""
    end
end
```
